Elliotte,

Thank you for your perspective. I understand that multiple relea=
ses would solve the problem of premature commitment to flexibility that lat=
er becomes an uncomfortable constraint. I was asking how to make multiple r=
eleases when our JAR file gets incorporated with third-party products. My f=
irst choice would be some kind of automatic update mechanism. If I understa=
nd your suggestion correctly, you are suggesting that I just don't worry ab=
out updating JUnit, as people who are interested in writing new Runners are=
 motivated enough to go get the new release. I will give up on the update m=
